text:
```json
{
  "explanation": "The description 'Used to ensure client requests hit the same proxy hosts and are more likely to retrieve content from cache' primarily relates to activities that are aimed at optimizing the provision of services, ensuring efficiency and performance. Specifically, it aligns with the purposes of 'Service Optimisation' and 'Technical Service Provision'. 'Service Optimisation' encompasses the idea of improving the efficiency of services such as ensuring requests are handled effectively by specific servers (proxy hosts) and retrieving cached content to improve performance. 'Technical Service Provision' refers to managing and providing technical functionalities necessary for delivering services, which includes managing the way requests are routed and handled.",
  "results": [69, 79],
  "unmatchedConcepts": []
}
```
